name: H.O.M.E (TOYXN, Scrollman)
description:
Being home alone is scary isn't it? Don't worry sweetheart, we gave you some tasks to do to keep you entretained ok?

Have fun!

Controls:

WASD: Move around

LCTRL: Crouch

LSHIFT:Sprint

E: Interact

This is a project for Motors 2 in the University of Girona.
